render_error.en: An error occurred while rendering the page; please try

description.en: Description

description_placeholder.cn: 如：作者名、参考的视频攻略链接（如有）等
description_placeholder.en: Example: Author name, reference video strategy links (if any), etc.

private_note.cn: 其他人无法在列表中看见，但可以通过神秘代码访问
private_note.en: Others cannot see it in the list, but can access it via shortcode

view_external.cn: 在 PRTS.Map 中查看关卡

no_hard_mode.cn: 该关卡没有突袭难度，无需选择
no_hard_mode.en: This level has no challenge mode, no need to select.

show_linker_buttons.cn: 始终显示动作之间的按钮

auto_toggle_selector_panel.cn: 自动在干员列表与关卡地图之间切换
auto_toggle_selector_panel.en: Automatically Toggle Between Operator List and Level Map

history_limit_note.cn: 更高的上限将使用更多内存。
history_limit_note.en: A higher limit will use more memory.

auto_sync_note.cn: 编辑后的 JSON 内容会自动同步到编辑器里
auto_sync_note.en: Edited JSON content will automatically sync to the editor

unsaved_warning.cn: 未保存的修改将在关闭 JSON 编辑器后丢失，是否仍要关闭？
unsaved_warning.en: Unsaved changes will be lost after closing the JSON editor. Do you still want to close it?

target_or_location.cn: 目标或位置只需填入其中一项
target_or_location.en: Only one of target or location is required

doc_placeholder.cn: MAA 执行此动作时显示的文字
doc_placeholder.en: Text displayed when MAA executes this action

guide.cn: 点击快捷编辑|点击添加干员|拖动上方的干员到这里
guide.en: Click Quick Edit|Click Add Operator|Drag Operators Here

replace_existing_operators.cn: 是否要替换掉已有的干员？
replace_existing_operators.en: Do you want to replace the existing operators?

skill_not_available.cn: 当前等级未解锁该技能
skill_not_available.en: This skill is not available at the current level

password_min_length.cn: 密码长度不能小于 8 位
password_min_length.en: Password must be at least 8 characters

password_max_length.cn: 密码长度不能大于 32 位
password_max_length.en: Password cannot be longer than 32 characters

username_min_length.cn: 用户名长度不能小于 4 位
username_min_length.en: Username must be at least 4 characters

username_max_length.cn: 用户名长度不能大于 24 位
username_max_length.en: Username cannot be longer than 24 characters

username_pattern.cn: 用户名前后不能包含空格
username_pattern.en: Username cannot start or end with spaces

token_length.cn: 邮箱验证码长度为 6 位
token_length.en: Email verification code must be 6 characters

email_verification_note.cn: 将通过发送邮件输入验证码确认
email_verification_note.en: A verification code will be sent to your email

enter_email_code.cn: 请输入邮件中的验证码
enter_email_code.en: Please enter the verification code from your email

passwords_dont_match.cn: 两次输入的密码不一致

invalid_email.cn: 邮箱输入为空或格式错误,请重新输入
invalid_email.en: Email is empty or has an invalid format, please try again

reset_success.en: Reset successful, please log in again

enter_email_code.cn: 请填入邮件中的验证码
enter_email_code.en: Please enter the verification code from your email

code_sent.cn: 验证码已发送至您的邮箱
code_sent.en: Verification code has been sent to your email

select_operator_description.cn: 选择干员、使用干员名、或使用干员组名引用
select_operator_description.en: Select an operator, use operator name, or reference an operator group

search_operator_hint.cn: 键入干员名、拼音或拼音首字母以搜索干员列表
search_operator_hint.en: Enter operator name, initials to start search

reference_group_hint.cn: 键入干员组名以引用干员组配置
reference_group_hint.en: Type group name to reference operator group configuration

operator_required.cn: 必须填写干员或干员组名
operator_required.en: Operator or group name is required

camera_movement_hint.cn: 移动距离一般不需要修改，只填写前置延迟（15000）和击杀数条件即可
camera_movement_hint.en: Movement distance usually doesn't need modification, just fill in pre-delay (15000) and Kill Count conditions

description.cn: 描述
description.en: Description

description_placeholder.cn: 描述，可选。会显示在界面上，没有实际作用
description_placeholder.en: Description, optional. Will be displayed in the interface but has no practical effect.

color_description.cn: 在 MAA 中打印描述时的颜色
color_description.en: Color used when printing descriptions in MAA

kill_count_description.cn: 如果没达到就一直等待。可选，默认为 0，直接执行
kill_count_description.en: If not reached, will wait. Optional, defaults to 0 (execute immediately)

cost_condition_description.cn: 如果没达到就一直等待。可选，默认为 0，直接执行。费用受潜能等影响，可能并不完全正确，仅适合对时间轴要求不严格的战斗，否则请使用下面的费用变化量条件。另外仅在费用是两位数的时候识别的比较准，三位数的费用可能会识别错，不推荐使用。
cost_condition_description.en: If not reached, will wait. Optional, defaults to 0. DP costs can be affected by potentials and may not be completely accurate. Only suitable for battles that don't require strict timing; otherwise use the DP Change condition below. Recognition is more reliable with two-digit DP costs; three-digit costs may be recognized incorrectly and are not recommended.

cost_change_description.cn: 如果没达到就一直等待。可选，默认为 0，直接执行。注意：费用变化量是从开始执行本动作时开始计算的（即：使用前一个动作结束时的费用作为基准）。支持负数，即费用变少了（例如"孑"等吸费干员使得费用变少了）。另外仅在费用是两位数的时候识别的比较准，三位数的费用可能会识别错，不推荐使用。
cost_change_description.en: If not reached, will wait. Optional, defaults to 0. Note: DP Change is calculated from the start of this action (using the DP at the end of the previous action as baseline). Supports negative values (e.g., when DP decreases due to operators like Jaye). Recognition is more reliable with two-digit DP costs; three-digit costs may be recognized incorrectly and are not recommended.

cooldown_description.cn: 如果没达到就一直等待。可选，默认 -1，不识别
cooldown_description.en: If not reached, will wait. Optional, defaults to -1 (not recognized)

direction_description.en: Direction the operator will face when deployed

invalid_location.en: Location is not a valid number

x_out_of_range.cn: X 坐标超出地图范围 (0-{{max}})
x_out_of_range.en: X coordinate out of map range (0-{{max}})

y_out_of_range.cn: Y 坐标超出地图范围 (0-{{max}})
y_out_of_range.en: Y coordinate out of map range (0-{{max}})

map_location_description.cn: 填完关卡名后开一局，会在目录下 map 文件夹中生成地图坐标图片
map_location_description.en: After entering stage name and starting a game, a map coordinate image will be generated in the 'map' folder

click_on_map.cn: 可在地图上点击以选择位置
click_on_map.en: Click on the map to select a location

update_action_not_found.cn: 未能找到要更新的动作
update_action_not_found.en: Could not find the action to update

name_or_location_required.cn: 类型为技能、撤退或子弹时间时，必须填写名称或位置其中一个
name_or_location_required.en: When type is Skill, Retreat, or BulletTime, you must provide either a name or location

env_var_not_defined.cn: 环境变量 VITE_THERESA_SERVER 未定义。
env_var_not_defined.en: Environment variable VITE_THERESA_SERVER is not defined.

unsaved_changes.cn: 当前干员组名修改未保存，是否放弃修改？
unsaved_changes.en: Current operator group name changes are not saved, discard changes?

will_replace_same_name.cn: 此操作会替换同名干员组
will_replace_same_name.en: This operation will replace the operator group with the same name

same_name_detected.en: Found operator group with the same name

edit_operator_info.cn: 编辑干员组中干员信息
edit_operator_info.en: Edit operator information in the group

unsaved_data_warning.cn: 所有未保存的数据均会丢失，确认继续？
unsaved_data_warning.en: All unsaved data will be lost, continue?

sort_ascending.en: Sort in ascending order (bottom to top)

sort_descending.en: Sort in descending order (bottom to top)

operator_in_group.en: Operator {{name}} is already in a group

will_replace_operator.cn: 此操作会覆盖已有干员
will_replace_operator.en: This will replace the existing operator

group_count.cn: 已显示全部 {{count}} 个干员组

group_name_empty.en: Operator group name cannot be empty

default_settings_tooltip.cn: 若不进行任何设置, 将使用默认值 (一技能 · 不自动使用 · 技能使用次数: 1次)
default_settings_tooltip.en: If no settings are applied, default values will be used (Skill 1 · Don't use automatically · Usage count: 1)

deploy_description.cn: 部署干员至指定位置。当费用不够时，会一直等待到费用够（除非 timeout）
deploy_description.en: Deploy operator to specified location. When DP is insufficient, will wait until enough (unless timeout)

use_skill_description.cn: 当技能 CD 没转好时，一直等待到技能 CD 好（除非 timeout）
use_skill_description.en: When skill cooldown isn't ready, will wait until it is (unless timeout)

switch_skill_usage_description.cn: 切换干员技能用法。例如，刚下桃金娘、需要她帮忙打几个怪，但此时不能自动开技能否则会漏怪，等中后期平稳了才需要她自动开技能，则可以在对应时刻后，将桃金娘的技能用法从「不自动使用」改为「好了就用」。
switch_skill_usage_description.en: Switch operator skill usage. For example, when Perfumer is just deployed and needs to help defeat some enemies, but automatic skill activation would miss enemies, and only in mid/late game should she activate skills automatically, you can change Perfumer's skill usage from 'Don't use automatically' to 'Use when ready'.

toggle_speed_description.cn: 执行后切换至二倍速，再次执行切换至一倍速
toggle_speed_description.en: After execution, switches to 2× speed; executing again switches to 1× speed

bullet_time_description.cn: 执行后将点击任意干员，进入 1/5 速度状态；再进行任意动作会恢复正常速度
bullet_time_description.en: After execution, click any operator to enter 1/5 speed state; any further action will restore normal speed

auto_mode_description.cn: 进入挂机模式。仅使用 "好了就用" 的技能，其他什么都不做，直到战斗结束
auto_mode_description.en: Enter auto mode. Only uses skills set to 'Use when ready', does nothing else until battle ends

print_description_details.cn: 对作战没有实际作用，仅用于输出描述内容（用来做字幕之类的）
print_description_details.en: Has no actual effect on battle, only outputs description content (for subtitles, etc.)

update_operator_not_found.cn: 未能找到要更新的干员
update_operator_not_found.en: Could not find the operator to update

update_group_not_found.cn: 未能找到要更新的干员组
update_group_not_found.en: Could not find the operator group to update

group_explanation.cn: 编队时将选择组内练度最高的一位干员；组内前后顺序并不影响判断
group_explanation.en: When forming a team, the operator with the highest level in the group will be selected; order within the group does not affect selection

name_description.cn: 任意名称，用于在动作中引用。例如：速狙、群奶
name_description.en: Any name, used for reference in actions. Examples: Fast-Snipers, AoE-Healers

name_required.en: Please enter an operator group name

operator_description.cn: 选择干员或直接使用搜索内容创建干员
operator_description.en: Select an operator or create one directly using the search content

search_hint.cn: 键入干员名、拼音或拼音首字母以从干员列表中搜索
search_hint.en: Enter operator name, initials to start search

group_membership_description.cn: 该干员的所属干员组，如果不存在则会自动创建
group_membership_description.en: The operator group this operator belongs to; if it doesn't exist, it will be created automatically

shortcode_description.cn: 神秘代码可在本站的作业详情中获取
shortcode_description.en: Shortcodes can be found in Job details on this site

json_update_notice.cn: 在此处编辑 JSON 将会实时更新表单
json_update_notice.en: Editing JSON here will update the form in real-time

see_errors_in_form.cn: 请在表单中查看错误信息
see_errors_in_form.en: Please check the error messages in the form

json_copied.cn: 已复制 JSON 到剪贴板

job_json_downloaded.cn: 已下载作业 JSON 文件

confirm_reset.en: Are you sure you want to reset the {{entityName}}?

for_main_event_stages.cn: 对于主线、活动关卡：键入关卡代号、关卡中文名或活动名称
for_main_event_stages.en: For main story or event stages: Type stage code, stage name or event name

for_paradox_stages.cn: 对于悖论模拟关卡：键入关卡名或干员名
for_paradox_stages.en: For paradox simulation stages: Type stage name or operator name

view_in_prts_map.cn: 在 PRTS.Map 中查看关卡

difficulty_description.cn: 在作业上显示的难度标识，如果不选择则不显示
difficulty_description.en: Difficulty indicator shown on the Job, not displayed if not selected

no_challenge_mode.cn: 该关卡没有突袭难度，无需选择
no_challenge_mode.en: This stage has no challenge mode, no need to select

title_placeholder.cn: 起一个引人注目的标题吧

description_placeholder.cn: 如：作者名、参考的视频攻略链接（如有）等
description_placeholder.en: Example: Author name, reference video strategy links (if any), etc.

drag_to_reorder_operators.cn: 拖拽以重新排序或分配干员
drag_to_reorder_operators.en: Drag to reorder or assign operators

drag_too_fast_issue.cn: 如果拖拽速度过快可能会使动画出现问题，此时请点击
drag_too_fast_issue.en: Dragging too quickly causes animation issues, please click

to_fix_no_data_loss.en: to fix. (no data will be lost)

autosave_info.cn: 每隔 {{minutes}} 分钟自动保存编辑过的内容，记录上限为 {{limit}} 条
autosave_info.en: Auto-saves edited content every {{minutes}} minutes, with a maximum of {{limit}} records

restore_confirmation.cn: 当前的编辑内容将会被覆盖，确定要恢复内容吗？
restore_confirmation.en: Current edits will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to restore this content?

bullet_time_error.cn: 第{{index}}个动作是"{{actionType}}"，但它的下一个动作不是"{{validTypes}}"其中之一
bullet_time_error.en: Action #{{index}} is "{{actionType}}", but the next action is not one of "{{validTypes}}"

regular_description.cn: 本作业支持普通难度作战

hard_description.cn: 本作业支持突袭难度作战

unknown_description.cn: 本作业并未支持难度支持标识，请自行根据作业的文字描述判断其所支持的作业难度等级。通常来说，未写明支持难度的作业均兼容突袭和普通难度作战。
unknown_description.en: This Job doesn't specify supported difficulty levels. Please refer to the Job description to determine compatibility. Generally, Jobs without specified difficulty support both standard and challenge modes.

add_to_job_set_title.cn: 添加 {{count}} 份作业到作业集

no_added_job_sets_yet.cn: 还没有已添加的作业集哦(￣▽￣)

add_from_list.en: Please add from the Job list

description.cn: 描述
description.en: Description

click_save.cn: 修改后请点击保存按钮

level_load_failed.cn: 关卡加载失败，使用备用排序
level_load_failed.en: Stage loading failed, using fallback sorting

contains_uploaded.cn: 文件列表中包含已上传的文件，请重新选择
contains_uploaded.en: File list contains already uploaded files, please select again

file_errors.cn: 文件存在错误，请修改内容
file_errors.en: Files have errors, please fix content

upload_complete.cn: 作业上传完成：成功 {{successCount}} 个，失败 {{errorCount}} 个

edit_before_upload_message.cn: 若需要在上传前进行编辑，请在作业编辑器的
edit_before_upload_message.en: If you need to edit before uploading, use

import_job.en: in the Job editor to import

json_files_only.cn: 仅支持 .json 文件，可多选
json_files_only.en: Only .json files supported, multiple selection allowed

json_parse_failed.cn: 请选择合法的 JSON 文件：JSON 解析失败：
json_parse_failed.en: Please select a valid JSON file: JSON parsing failed:

no_comments.cn: 还没有评论，发一条评论鼓励作者吧！
no_comments.en: No comments yet. Be the first to encourage the author!

confirm_delete.en: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

all_subcomments_deleted.cn: 所有子评论都会被删除。
all_subcomments_deleted.en: All replies will be deleted as well.

reply_target_not_found.en: The comment you're replying to doesn't exist

liked_percentage.cn: 有{{percent}}%的人为本作业点了个赞（{{ratio}}）

confirm_delete_task_set.en: Are you sure you want to delete this Job set?

render_problem.cn: 渲染此作业集时出现了问题。是否是还未支持的作业集类型？
render_problem.en: There was a problem rendering this Job set. Is it an unsupported Job set type?

render_preview_problem.cn: 渲染此作业集的预览时出现了问题 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ
render_preview_problem.en: There was a problem rendering the preview of this Job set Σ(っ °Д °;)っ

confirm_close_comments.en: Are you sure you want to close the comments section?

existing_comments_preserved.cn: 已有的评论不会被删除，重新开启后会恢复显示
existing_comments_preserved.en: Existing comments won't be deleted and will be visible again when reopened

confirm_open_comments.en: Are you sure you want to open the comments section?

confirm_delete_task.en: Are you sure you want to delete this Job?

render_problem.cn: 渲染此作业时出现了问题。是否是还未支持的作业类型？
render_problem.en: There was a problem rendering this Job. Is it an unsupported Job type?

render_preview_problem.cn: 渲染此作业的预览时出现了问题。是否是还未支持的作业类型？
render_preview_problem.en: There was a problem rendering the preview of this Job. Is it an unsupported Job type?

operator_group_tooltip.cn: 干员组：组内干员可以任选其一，自动编队时按最高练度来选择
operator_group_tooltip.en: Operator Group: Choose any operator in the group; auto-formation selects the highest level

no_operators_added.en: No operators have been added to this Job

no_actions_defined.cn: 作业并未定义任何动作
no_actions_defined.en: No actions have been defined for this Job

logout_confirm.en: Are you sure you want to log out?

account_not_activated.cn: 账号未激活，请在退出登录后，以重置密码的方式激活
account_not_activated.en: Account not activated. Please log out and use the password reset feature to activate.

only_loaded_items.cn: 只能选择已加载的项目
only_loaded_items.en: Only loaded items can be selected

search_help.cn: 输入干员名、拼音或拼音首字母以搜索
search_help.en: Enter operator name, initials to start search

description.cn: 不由 MAA 自动开启技能、或干员技能并不需要操作开启（自动触发）。若需要手动开启技能，请添加「使用技能」动作
description.en: Skills won't be activated automatically by MAA, or for operators whose skills don't need manual activation (auto-trigger). If you need to manually activate a skill, add a 'Use Skill' action

description.cn: 有多少次用多少次，例如：棘刺 3 技能、桃金娘 1 技能等
description.en: Use as many times as available. Examples: Thorns S3, Perfumer S1, etc.

alt_title.cn: 自动使用技能（指定次数）

description.cn: 默认仅使用一次，例如：山 2 技能
description.en: By default, only use once. Example: Mountain S2

description.cn: (锐意开发中) 画饼.jpg
description.en: (In development) Coming Soon™

description.cn: 未知用法
description.en: Unknown usage

description.cn: 部署干员至指定位置。当费用不够时，会一直等待到费用够（除非 timeout）
description.en: Deploy operator to specified location. When DP is insufficient, will wait until enough (unless timeout)

description.cn: 将干员从作战中撤出
description.en: Withdraw operator from battle

description.cn: 当技能 CD 没转好时，一直等待到技能 CD 好（除非 timeout）
description.en: When skill cooldown isn't ready, will wait until it is (unless timeout)

description.cn: 切换干员技能用法。例如，刚下桃金娘、需要她帮忙打几个怪，但此时不能自动开技能否则会漏怪，等中后期平稳了才需要她自动开技能，则可以在对应时刻后，将桃金娘的技能用法从「不自动使用」改为「好了就用」。
description.en: Switch operator skill usage. For example, when Perfumer is just deployed and needs to help defeat some enemies, but automatic skill activation would miss enemies, and only in mid/late game should she activate skills automatically, you can change Perfumer's skill usage from 'Don't use automatically' to 'Use when ready'.

description.cn: 执行后切换至二倍速，再次执行切换至一倍速
description.en: After execution, switches to 2× speed; executing again switches to 1× speed

description.cn: 执行后将点击任意干员，进入 1/5 速度状态；再进行任意动作会恢复正常速度。下一个任务必须是"部署"、"技能"、"撤退"其中之一，此时会提前点开该干员，等待满足条件后再执行。
description.en: After execution, click any operator to enter 1/5 speed state; any further action will restore normal speed. The next task must be one of 'Deploy', 'Skill', or 'Retreat', which will select that operator in advance and wait until conditions are met before executing.

description.cn: 仅用于引航者试炼模式中切换区域
description.en: Only used for switching areas in Integrated Strategies mode

description.cn: 进入挂机模式。仅使用 "好了就用" 的技能，其他什么都不做，直到战斗结束
description.en: Enter auto mode. Only uses skills set to 'Use when ready', does nothing else until battle ends

description.cn: 对作战没有实际作用，仅用于输出描述内容（用来做字幕之类的）
description.en: Has no actual effect on battle, only outputs description content (for subtitles, etc.)

description.cn: 未知动作类型
description.en: Unknown action type

description.cn: 延迟一定时间后，开始检查其他条件。注意：这里的含义和旧版编辑器以及 MAA 作业协议里的前置延迟是相反的
description.en: Delay for a certain time before checking other conditions. Note: The meaning here is opposite to the pre-delay in the old editor and MAA Job Protocol.

description.cn: 所有条件全部满足后，延迟一定时间。注意：这里的含义和旧版编辑器以及 MAA 作业协议里的后置延迟是相反的
description.en: Delay for a certain time after all conditions are met. Note: The meaning here is opposite to the post-delay in the old editor and MAA Job Protocol.

description.cn: 达到一定费用后开始执行。费用受潜能等影响，可能并不完全正确，仅适合对时间轴要求不严格的战斗，否则请使用费用变化量条件。仅在费用是两位数的时候识别的比较准，三位数的费用可能会识别错，不推荐使用。
description.en: Execute after reaching a certain DP. DP is affected by potential and other factors, and may not be completely accurate. It is only suitable for battles with less strict timeline requirements. Otherwise, please use the DP Change condition. Recognition is more reliable with a two-digit DP; a three-digit DP may be recognized incorrectly and are not recommended.

description.cn: 从前一个动作结束时的费用开始计算，达到一定变化量后开始执行。支持负数，即费用变少了（例如“孑”等吸费干员使得费用变少了）。仅在费用是两位数的时候识别的比较准，三位数的费用可能会识别错，不推荐使用。
description.en: Execute after reaching a certain change in DP from the previous action. Supports negative values (e.g., when DP decreases due to operators like Jaye). Recognition is more reliable with a two-digit DP; a three-digit DP may be recognized incorrectly and are not recommended.

description.cn: 达到一定击杀数时开始执行
description.en: Execute after reaching a certain number of kills

description.cn: 冷却中的干员达到一定数量时开始执行
description.en: Execute after reaching a certain number of operators on cooldown

check_url.cn: 请检查您的 URL 是否正确
check_url.en: Please check if your URL is correct

negative_cost_not_supported.cn: 目前暂不支持上传费用变化量为负数的动作（第{{actionIndex}}个动作）
negative_cost_not_supported.en: Currently, actions with negative DP Change are not supported (action #{{actionIndex}})

public_task_description.cn: 公开作业：会在所有列表中显示
public_task_description.en: Public Job: Will be visible in all lists

private_task_description.cn: 私有作业：其他人无法在列表中看见，但可以通过神秘代码访问
private_task_description.en: Private Job: Others won't see it in lists, but can be accessed via secret code

validation_error.cn: 作业内容存在错误，请检查
validation_error.en: Job content has errors, please check

slogan_line1.en: The Job Site Solves Your Worries

slogan_line2.en: Bookmark us so can find your way back!

json_downloaded.cn: 已下载作业 JSON 文件，前往 MAA 选择即可使用~
json_downloaded.en: Job JSON file downloaded, go to MAA to use it~

json_data_error.cn: JSON 数据错误，请联系开发者
json_data_error.en: JSON data error, please contact the developer

shortcode_copied.cn: 已复制神秘代码，前往 MAA 粘贴即可使用~
shortcode_copied.en: Secret code copied, paste it in MAA to use it~

unauthorized.en: Not logged in, please login first

token_expired.cn: 登录已过期，请重新登录
token_expired.en: Login has expired, please login again

invalid_token.en: Login is invalid, please login again

serialization_comment.cn: 默认的序列化会把 undefined 转成字符串，我真的会谢
serialization_comment.en: Default serialization converts undefined to string, which is undesirable
